task.title: Associate Products with Content Using the Library
task.shortdesc: Associate products with content from the Library to keep your content and product catalog in sync in one easy-to-manage location.

context.p: When you publish an App with that content, the Call-to-Action Button will automatically display, causing greater engagement on your site and better sales.

step.cmd: Select a one or more pieces of content from a folder.

info.note: You can only associate images with products for content that is saved in a folder. You must have rights for an image to associate it with a product.

step.cmd: Click Products from the Bulk Actions Menu.
Click the Product Folder which contains the product to associate with the content.
Click the check box next to one or more products to associate with the content, then click Add to save the association.
